name: Powerful Cleaning Brush
description: The Powerful Cleaning Brush is a heavy-duty, versatile tool designed for deep cleaning with minimal effort. Its durable bristles effectively tackle tough grime and dirt on various surfaces, including tiles, grout, and carpets.

name: Xiaomi 6-in-1 cleaning Brush
description: The Xiaomi 6-in-1 Brush is a cordless, rotary cleaning tool with a 2000 MA battery. It features six interchangeable heads for effortless cleaning of showers, kitchens, and bathrooms. Ideal for tackling dirt and grime on various surfaces.
